title: Can we adjust Yas' Q so it can't be spammed no matter what.
body:
Just like Fiora {{champion:114}} if you miss your Q on any target, it goes on a extended cooldown. (this way players can't spam a free-ish dash/flash). I feel like Yas {{champion:157}} should be the same. If they miss a Q, then he either needs to take damg (pulling his shoulder or something..lol) or have a extended CD bc why should he get rewarded for just spamming a free Q 24/7. Where's the skill in that. 

Kinda tired of seeing Yas get rewarded for low skill plays and moves. Just my 2 cents.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

replies.body: Your two cents are wrong. Why nerf a champion whose winrate is 48-50%?
Never said nerf, but "adjust". Imagine if kat{{champion:55}}  could toss her Q every .25 secs..o_O..
Imagine if any champion who wasn't consciously designed with being able to spam their q every second was able to spam their q every second
then shouldnt his q be balanced on his low cd?  yet it is as strong as the other champs abilities

Champions individual skills are balanced in accordance with the power of the rest of their kit.  The entire champion is a package and you can't blindly compare a single skill with another skill.  

Blitzcrank Q is probably one of the most useful, powerful skills in the entire game.  That's why the rest of his skills and passive are a little more underwhelming.

Ryze's Q by itself is a very weak projectile on a relatively long cooldown and too much mana.  But it's supported by the rest of his kit
but yasuos every other skills are very good

>
> Never said nerf, but "adjust". Imagine if kat{{champion:55}}  could toss her Q every .25 secs..o_O..

If she could, that would be OP, because she's not designed around that. For that matter, Yasuo can't Q every 0.25 seconds, either; the minimum CD is 1.33s after he gets 111.11% bonus attack speed (it starts at 4s). This is like saying that Corki is OP because "imagine if Lux could ult every 0.25 seconds."

Also, the things you are describing _would_ be nerfs, even though the euphemism you used was "adjustments." This is nothing but a rant, and as such it belongs on [RANT](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/rant).

Ults are one thing. (and 28 secs of CD for Lux ult is basically the same..lolz) 

"Free" poke and damg is another. It's not even like Yas has mana or energy to work with. Nothing to bar him from spamming moves.

>
> Never said nerf, but "adjust". Imagine if kat{{champion:55}}  could toss her Q every .25 secs..o_O..

Imagine comparing a punishable Q that needs 2 stacks and a third use in order to actually get the knockup, to an ability that deals 300 magic damage late game that bounces to 3 targets, is on click, AND provides mobility for its caster + that mobility is a nuke. Imagine.

Maybe it has a 48-50% wr because his playerbase is composed by autist 8 year old bonobos, and maybe raising a bit his skill floor so my goldfish can't get pentas with him will made his playerbase wake up and stop facerolling the keyboard.

So you convinced yourself that a champion who is loved by pro players due to his complexity and high skill ceiling has a low winrate, not because he's difficult to master, but because everyone who plays him is magically and automatically dumber?

Pros don't play champs because they are "fun" or "take skill". They pick the ones that deal the most damg with lower skill caps so they can win games. The ones that take a little skill to play still do a lot of damg for their stats. That's why its the same 20 champs out of over a hundred that get played!

No one said anything about fun, stop trying.

Do you know what "Takes skill" even implies?  It implies a high degree of mastery for a high amount of effectiveness.  That's why champions like Ezreal, Cass, or Lissandra are picked midlane much more in pro play than simple-but-effective champs like Annie.  Champs who are overly complicated with a low skill ceiling are terribly designed and no one picks them.
